data.name: Taylor Rae Almont
data.description: American fitness trainer and creator of the Fit with Taylor program, known for her bodyweight workouts and focus on mental health and wellness.

data.name: Karlene Karst
data.description: Canadian fitness coach and nutritionist, known for her plant-based meal plans and focus on holistic health.

data.name: Kyla Ritchie
data.description: American fitness influencer and creator of the KGFit workout program, known for her motivational messaging and accessible workout videos.

data.name: Alexia Clark
data.description: American fitness coach and creator of the Alexia Clark workout program, known for her high-intensity strength training routines and use of unconventional workout equipment.

data.name: Hannah Eden
data.description: British fitness trainer and creator of the Hannah Eden Fitness program, known for her intense, high-energy workouts and focus on functional fitness.

data.name: Sohla El-Waylly
data.description: American chef and food writer, known for her inventive recipes and commitment to inclusivity and diversity in the food industry.

data.name: Hetty McKinnon
data.description: Australian chef and cookbook author, known for her plant-based recipes and focus on sustainable, local ingredients.

data.name: Rachel Ama
data.description: British chef and cookbook author, known for her vegan recipes and emphasis on Caribbean and West African flavors.

data.name: Lorena Salinas
data.description: Mexican-American food blogger, known for her traditional Mexican recipes and focus on sharing her family's culinary heritage.

data.name: Sabrina Ghayour
data.description: Iranian-British chef and cookbook author, known for her Middle Eastern-inspired recipes and modern twist on classic dishes.

data.name: Nyma Tang
data.description: American beauty influencer and YouTuber, known for her focus on inclusivity and representation in the beauty industry, particularly for those with darker skin tones.

data.name: Hyram Yarbro
data.description: American skincare influencer and YouTuber, known for his skincare tips and recommendations, and his focus on affordable, accessible skincare.

data.name: Ashley Strong
data.description: American makeup artist and beauty influencer, known for her colorful, creative makeup looks and tutorials.

data.name: Eris Tran
data.description: Vietnamese-American beauty influencer and makeup artist, known for her dramatic makeup looks and use of bold, bright colors.

data.name: RawBeautyKristi
data.description: American YouTuber and beauty influencer, known for her unfiltered and honest reviews of makeup products and her inspiring message of self-acceptance.

data.name: Elona Karafin
data.description: American travel blogger and influencer, known for her stunning photography and adventurous spirit, as well as her focus on sustainable and responsible travel practices.

data.name: Gabby Beckford
data.description: American travel blogger and influencer, known for her informative guides on budget travel and her emphasis on promoting diversity and inclusion in the travel industry.

data.name: Meagan Faye
data.description: Canadian travel blogger and influencer, known for her breathtaking landscape photography and her focus on exploring lesser-known destinations off the beaten path.

data.name: Daniel James
data.description: British travel blogger and influencer, known for his immersive and insightful travel content, as well as his advocacy for mental health awareness and wellness while traveling.

data.name: Paulina Kajankova
data.description: Slovakian travel blogger and influencer, known for her vibrant and colorful travel content, as well as her focus on sustainable tourism and eco-friendly travel practices.
